headline: Wright Flood Announces Agreement To Acquire Assets of Poulton Associates LLC
summary: Acquisition makes Wright Flood the largest flood insurance provider in the United StatesCLEARWATER, Fla., Oct. 24, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Wright National Flood Insurance Company (“Wright Flood”) announced today that its affiliate, Wright National Flood Insurance Services LLC, an operating company of Arrowhead Programs, has entered into an agreement to acquire the assets of Poulton Associates LLC (“Poulton”), one of the top providers of private flood insurance in the nation. headline: Brown & Brown (BRO): Evaluating the Stock's Valuation After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: Brown & Brown (BRO) stock has seen shifts in recent weeks, drawing attention for its longer-term return trends and underlying fundamentals. Investors are looking closely at how the company’s recent performance fits into its multi-year growth trajectory. See our latest analysis for Brown & Brown. Brown & Brown’s share price has dipped nearly 12% since the start of the year, reflecting softer market sentiment even as the company’s robust revenue and net income growth point to a healthy...

headline: Should You Reassess Brown & Brown After Recent Drop Despite Expansion News?
summary: Thinking about what to do with Brown & Brown stock? You’re not alone. Plenty of investors are eyeing the insurance giant, looking for signs of whether now is a smart time to buy, hold, or move on. After some big gains over the last several years, up 111.2% in five years and nearly 60% over the past three, recent months have brought back a dose of reality. This year, shares have slipped by 11.7%, and the past month alone saw a drop of 3.7%. That said, last week’s small rally of 1.5% offers a...
